thread.title: Completely wireless charging becomes a reality at CES in Las Vegas

title: Completely wireless charging becomes a reality at CES in Las Vegas
text:
Completely wireless charging becomes a reality at CES in Las Vegas 3:04pm GMT - 01:08 
The frustrations of charging your electronic devices with a wired charger could be a thing of the past as a company launches its radio frequency energy charger at the Consumer Electronics Show in Las Vegas. Amy Pollock reports.
